::Havoc::

Havoc moves back, easily parrying the swing and stabbing at 
Demolition's stomach.

"Not a good approach," he comments as he strikes.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> "Computer, give me a katana Earth sword."
> It appeared in his hand. He took a stance and cirqled Havoc.
> He suddenly lurched at Havok, swinging.
